item.title: Generate SSL from DNS challanges with certbot
item.description: In this notes I will write on English, I just learn and get used to English. First thing first this my notes with Cloudflare domain management. Let’s start, I have problem to generate ssl on local network. Because local network don’t have public IP to be called from certbot, to authenticate that domain is valid. So from my boss I have knowledge to solve the problem with generate certificate from certbot with authenticate challange with DNS.
